thread.title: Warriors expect even bigger things on offense this season
thread.title_full: Warriors expect even bigger things on offense this season

author:
Josh Dubow
AP Writer
title: Warriors expect even bigger things on offense this season
text:
Previous Next Warriors expect even bigger things on offense this season 
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry, left, expects to see his team’s office begin to truly click in its second year. Associated Press file photo Posted: Tuesday, October 13, 2015 11:28 pm | Updated: 11:42 pm, Tue Oct 13, 2015. AP Writer SantaFeNewMexican.com | 0 comments 
OAKLAND, Calif. — With an NBA title, 67 regular season wins and an MVP performance from Stephen Curry, it would seem it would be hard for things to get much better for the Golden State Warriors.
